feature.label: ODFDOM
feature.description: ODFDOM is a free OpenDocument Format (ODF) library. Its purpose is to provide an easy common way to create, access and manipulate ODF files, without requiring detailed knowledge of the ODF specification. It is designed to provide the ODF developer community with an easy lightwork programming API portable to any object-oriented language.
feature.copyright: The ODF Toolkit includes a number of subcomponents with separate copyright notices and license terms.
